name: Forms Credential Collector File
summary: Learn about .FCC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The FCC authentication file is typically named "login.fcc" and is located at "http://webservername/siteminderagent/forms/login.fcc."

description: Contains authentication settings for logging in a user to the Netegrity SiteMinder Policy Server; written in a simple markup language that includes HTML and some custom notation.
